name: The Divide
description:
The Divide is a story driven game about a westerner and his best friend.  Help the character overcome self-destruction and in doing so prevent  world destruction.  made for "The Unpro" game jam about "Growth."

-Explore a desolate desert and abandoned towns.

-Interact with many objects, people, and entities.  

-Solve some puzzle obstacles/ quests to progress in the story.

-Make choices that determine your resolve.  "multiple-endings"

-Custom graphics and music

-Some mild horror and  mature subject matter. 

-Game is still subject to changes due to the nature of game jam time

restraints. If you encounter any game play issues, grammatical errors

etc...  feel free to leave me a comment. I will fix them as quick as I can :) 

-Updated 7/16/18-

-
